load: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE);

queries.users.get.all: SELECT json_group_array(json_object('id', id, 'name', name, 'email', email)) FROM users;
queries.users.get.default: SELECT json_object('id', id, 'name', name, 'email', email) FROM users WHERE id = $1;
queries.users.delete.default: DELETE FROM users WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id;
queries.users.patch.email: UPDATE users SET email = :email WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id;
queries.users.post.default: INSERT INTO users (name, email) VALUES (:name, :email) RETURNING id;
queries.users.put.default: UPDATE users SET name = :name, email = :email WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id;
